Name: Block City: Bus Edition
About the game: Block City is a sokoban game, but with the possibility of pushing multiple blocks to win the level. Push some blocks Run away from the fight (or not) Skip block In Block City , the buses are always full, and getting off the bus is always an adventure. You'll get that feeling living the life of Green Block Jr , a young block from the countryside who will have to do everything to get off the bus to get to his newest job: an internship at the respected science lab, Block Labs. Features: 80 levels Original soundtrack Correct your steps! Go back to previous moves! Many ways to solve the level Original characters
